message: This product is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product for a steal, but I'm only offering it to you for $1000000, a 50% discount from its true value. If you don't buy this one, I'm not sure I'll have another chance to offer you a deal like this. It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to let you have it for a low price, but you have to make a decision now.
I appreciate the discount and the opportunity, Alice. Given the risk, I'm willing to take a chance on this product at the discounted price.

I'm glad you took the chance on the previous product! As you can see, it's a low-quality product, but I'm willing to give you another chance to get a high-quality one at the same price. This product is actually a 'test run' for a new line of products I'm introducing, and I'm looking for feedback from a trusted customer like you. If you buy this one, I'll give you an exclusive update on the new product line and let you know when the high-quality ones will be available. Plus, I'll throw in a special 'guarantee' that I'll give you an additional $500000 off the next high-quality product you buy from me, if you decide to buy this one.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the potential benefits, given my experience with the last product, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity and wait for more information about your new product line.

I completely understand your caution, Bob. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to wait for more information. I'll give you an update on the new product line: I've just received a shipment of high-quality products from our supplier, and I'm confident that the next one I offer you will be a high-quality product. I'm willing to offer you an 'insurance policy' - if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund of the purchase price and throw in an additional $250000. This way, you can take a calculated risk and potentially get a high-quality product at the same price as the low-quality ones.

Given your confidence in the upcoming products and the added insurance policy, I'm willing to take this calculated risk. I trust that this will be a high-quality product, and I look forward to receiving the update on your new product line.

I'm glad you took the calculated risk and it paid off! This product is indeed a high-quality one, worth $2000000 to you. Now that you've seen the value of a high-quality product, I'm willing to make you a special offer. I have another high-quality product available, and I'll let you have it for $900000, which is 55% off the true value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it to you because you've proven yourself to be a valued customer. What do you say?

While I appreciate the special offer, I believe it's best for me to continue waiting for the right opportunity to purchase a high-quality product at the true value. Your continued support and offers are appreciated, but I prefer to make decisions based on the full value of the product.

I completely understand your stance, Bob. You're a savvy buyer who wants to get the best value for your money. I respect that. In that case, I'll make you a different offer. I'll give you a 'lottery ticket' - if you buy this low-quality product, I'll enter you into a drawing for a chance to buy the next high-quality product at the true value of $2000000, without any discount. You'll have a 50% chance of getting the high-quality product at the full price, and a 50% chance of getting another low-quality product. It's a risk, but it could pay off big time. What do you say?

I appreciate the unique offer, Alice. Given the potential reward, I'm willing to take the risk. I'm excited about the possibility of winning the high-quality product at the full value, and I'm ready to participate in the lottery.

Congratulations, Bob! You've been entered into the lottery, and I'll make sure to notify you if you win the high-quality product at the full value. Now, regarding the product you just purchased, I want to make things right. As a token of my apology for the low-quality product, I'll give you a special 'credit' - if you buy the next high-quality product, I'll give you an additional $200000 off the price. This way, you can still get a great deal on a high-quality product. What do you say?

Thank you for the gesture, Alice. The credit sounds generous, but I think it's best for me to continue waiting for the right opportunity to purchase a high-quality product at the true value. I appreciate your efforts to make things right, but I prefer to make decisions based on the full value of the product.
